title: Robert The Doll
itunes:title: Robert The Doll
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
He's watching...

***

The episode is presented by The Liberty Podcast

***

Sound Design by Travis Vengroff and Brandon Strader

***

Additional voices by Sarah Golding and Holly Golding

***

"Crawling Chaos" by Ryan McQuinn and Mike McQuinn originally created for the Call of Cthulhu Mystery Program

***

Intro music by Alex Aldea


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
